chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy Note20 5G is experiencing the following issue:
The phone detects the SIM card but does not provide any access to the SIM card functionality.
Thank you for your help,

Once received, the seller has 3 business days (or 5 if it's a laptop or electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Alternatively, they have 2 business days to process a refund (if you are eligible).
A return is considered complete when the customer has met all the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not sustained any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that personal data has been erased.
✔ Has confirmed that they have included the return label.
✔ Understands that they must include accessories and proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (or 5 if it's a laptop or electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Alternatively, they have 2 business days to process a refund (if you are eligible).

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we are unable to repair the device and we do not have enough stock to process an exchange. I have proceeded with a refund instead.

Regards,
RK
